---

Non-[lizardfolk](/Traits.aspx?ID=760) creatures in [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453) are [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) to you. If you have a swim Speed, non-lizardfolk creatures that are in water and lack a swim Speed are also off-guard to you.
